goal.en: "Students will learn how to use the equipment of electronic circuits, and develop the abilities of analyzing and debugging circuits."
goal.ch: 學習使用基本的電子電路儀器，培養對電子電路分析和偵錯的基本能力。

content.en:
P-Spice
Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
1. P-Spice circuit simulator
MOSFET
2. Measurement of MOSFET
3. CMOS circuit and characteristic waveform
4. CMOS amplifier and transfer curve
BJT
5. BJT single-stage amplifier
6. BJT differential amplifier
7. Class B output driver
8. Linear power regulator
content.ch:
"課程概述：學習P-Spice 電路模擬軟體,場效電晶體基板效應量測, CMOS負載電路和特性曲線量測,BJT 單級放大器,BJT差動放大器,CMOS 轉移曲線和放大電路, Class B輸出級與線性直流電源穩壓器。
課程目標：培養學生實作與解決問題之能力
P-Spice
Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
1. P-Spice circuit simulator
MOSFET
2. Measurement of MOSFET
3. CMOS circuit and characteristic waveform
4. CMOS amplifier and transfer curve
BJT
5. BJT single-stage amplifier
6. BJT differential amplifier
7. Class B output driver
8. Linear power regulator"

grading.en:
Exams (midterm and final exams) 80%
Project (oral presentation and written report) 20%
grading.ch:
Exams (midterm and final exams) 80%
Project (oral presentation and written report) 20%

en: Department:Department of Electrical Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Class:A only.
Department:Department of Electrical Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science、Minor-Electrical Engineering、Double Major-Department of Electrical Engineering only.
ch: 系所:限電機工程學系。年級:限二年級。班別:限A。
系所:限電機工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限資訊電機學院學士班、輔系-電機工程學系、雙主修-電機工程學系。
